message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob.  I believe this split reflects the fact that time is more valuable to you given the faster rate of inflation you face.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, the inflation rate I face is quite steep. I propose a more even split that still acknowledges your slightly slower rate of inflation.
Bob, I understand your position on the inflation, but your offer was too skewed in your favor. This offer is a compromise, reflecting the urgency for us both to reach an agreement.
